channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 9 + 10 April 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 9 + 10 April 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 9 + 10 April 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 9 + 10 April 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: 3 student job vacancies at the SLAM Centre
item.description: The University Language Centre (SLAM) is seeking 2 student workers to help with administrative activities and 1 student worker to help with graphic design projects. Applications are open until 12 noon on 18 February. For further details and to apply, please see the job posting.%0A

item.title: 10th SLAM webinar "How to use and adapt authentic material in English class" ‚Äì 25 February 2025 at 15.00
item.description: Registrations are now open for the webinar "How to use and adapt authentic material in English class", which will be given by Isabella Baldi on 25 February 2025 at 15.00. %0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Final ranking for International mobility contributions academic year 2023/2024
item.description: The final ranking list for international mobility contributions a.y. 2023/2024 has been published.%0AThe outcome is available in your online helpdesk, under "Right to study, grants, accommodation and catering" > "if you want to access the details of the rankings published in the last two academic years".%0A

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in March-April at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B1 Preliminary (PET) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in March-April at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Applications to open-admission Master‚Äôs degree programmes a.a. 2025/26
item.description: Applications to open-admission Master‚Äôs degree programmes for the academic year 2025/2026 are open.%0ANon-EU students VISA applicants can apply for admission until 30 April 2025.%0A

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 19 + 20 March 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 19 + 20 March 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 18 + 19 March 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 18 + 19 March 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for CELI exams CELI 1 A2 - CELI 2 B1 - CELI 3 B2 levels on 12+13 March 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 12+13 March 2025.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 2 B1 and the CELI 3 B2 exams are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
